title: One Piece Episode #639 Anime Review
author: Unknown
description: Written anime review discussing Episode 639, where the handover team approaches Green Bit and encounters fearsome Fighting Fish. The review notes appreciation for Bellamy's character development and his interaction with Luffy after the Block B match.

title: One Piece Episode 639 Discussion Thread
author: GotWoot Forum Members
description: Forum discussion thread from April 6, 2014, with users discussing Episode 639 and providing character analysis of the events in the episode.

title: 638-639: 'A Deadly Blow! The Astonishing King Punch!' and 'The Fighting Fish Strike! Across the Deadly Iron Bridge!'
author: Never Watched One Piece (Tumblr)
description: Retrospective blog post covering episodes 638 and 639, discussing the events at the Corrida Colosseum and Law's team crossing to Green Bit.

description: Video reaction to One Piece Episode 639, available to Patreon supporters.
